relevant_findings.General: Lying still, in no acute distress
relevant_findings.Abdomen: Soft, appropriately tender, nondistended, no rebound/guarding

Ultrasound.other_structures: Aorta, inferior vena cava, right kidney unremarkable; no free fluid identified
